examples.description: returns true for words starting with a vowel
examples.full_description: Working with Regular expressions #starts_with_a_vowel? returns true for words starting with a vowel

examples.description: returns false for words starting with a consonant
examples.full_description: Working with Regular expressions #starts_with_a_vowel? returns false for words starting with a consonant

examples.description: returns an array with the words starting with 'un' and ending with 'ing'
examples.full_description: Working with Regular expressions #words_starting_with_un_and_ending_with_ing returns an array with the words starting with 'un' and ending with 'ing'

examples.description: returns an array of words that are five letters long
examples.full_description: Working with Regular expressions #words_five_letters_long returns an array of words that are five letters long

examples.description: Returns true for text starting with a capital letter and ending with puncutation
examples.full_description: Working with Regular expressions #first_word_capitalized_and_ends_with_punctuation? Returns true for text starting with a capital letter and ending with puncutation

examples.description: Returns false for text starting with an uncapitalized letter but ending with puncutation
examples.full_description: Working with Regular expressions #first_word_capitalized_and_ends_with_punctuation? Returns false for text starting with an uncapitalized letter but ending with puncutation

examples.description: Returns false for text starting with a capital letter but ending without puncutation
examples.full_description: Working with Regular expressions #first_word_capitalized_and_ends_with_punctuation? Returns false for text starting with a capital letter but ending without puncutation

examples.description: Returns false for text starting without a capital letter and ending without puncutation
examples.full_description: Working with Regular expressions #first_word_capitalized_and_ends_with_punctuation? Returns false for text starting without a capital letter and ending without puncutation

examples.description: returns true for valid phone numbers, regardless of formatting
examples.full_description: Working with Regular expressions #valid_phone_number? returns true for valid phone numbers, regardless of formatting

examples.description: returns false for invalid phone numbers, regardless of formatting
examples.full_description: Working with Regular expressions #valid_phone_number? returns false for invalid phone numbers, regardless of formatting
